state: Welcome to another exciting round of TextWorld! First of all, go to the east. Next, make sure that the Microsoft style hatch is unlocked with the Microsoft style key. After that, look and see that the Microsoft style hatch is wide open. After that, head south. With that done, doublecheck that the portal is ajar. Then, travel east. After that, doublecheck that the passageway is wide open. After that, go east. Then, make an attempt to head north. And then, ensure that the gateway is open. After that, travel north. And then, ensure that the door is open. And then, venture west. After that, pick up the potato from the bookshelf. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Cubicle =- You arrive in a cubicle. An usual kind of place. You see a coffer. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. > -= Cubicle =-0/1
next_state: -= Office =- You've entered an office. You start to take note of what's in the room. There is a closed Microsoft style hatch leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the west. > -= Office =-0/2

admissible_commands: unlock Microsoft style hatch with Microsoft style key

next_action: unlock Microsoft style hatch with Microsoft style key

next_state: -= Study =- You've walked into a typical room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be typical. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the study. You can make out an armchair! On the armchair you can make out a latchkey. There is an open passageway leading west. There is an open hatch leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. > -= Study =-0/9

next_state: -= Basement =- You arrive in a basement. A standard one. You begin to take stock of what's here. You see a chest! The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a stand. The stand appears to be empty. You move on, clearly done caring about TextWorld. There is an open gateway leading south. There is a closed door leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Basement =-0/12

admissible_commands: insert Microsoft style key into chest
put Microsoft style key on stand
